name: Ethereal Crucifix
notes: The player can only have one of this trinket in their inventory.

name: Fortifying Garlic
notes: The player can only have one of this trinket in their inventory.

name: Hunter's Talons
notes: Increases maximum food eaten at camp by 1, as compared to 2 with +100% Food Consumed.

name: Scouting Whistle
notes: With above 75 light, the Scouting bonus is +15%, while below 51 has no bonus (thus the scouting bonus is a net +5% compared to high light).

name: Venomous Vial
notes:
Found after defeating the first nightmare.
Cannot be sold.

name: Shimmering Scale
notes:
Found after defeating the second nightmare.
Cannot be sold.

name: Dancer's Footwraps
notes:
Found after defeating the third nightmare.
Cannot be sold.

name: Fanged Spear Tip
notes:
Found after defeating the fourth nightmare.
Cannot be sold.

name: Cuirboilli
notes:
Found after defeating the fifth nightmare.
Cannot be sold.

name: Aria Box
notes: Very rarely dropped by Madman (about 4% chance)

name: Crescendo Box
notes: Very rarely dropped by Madman (about 4% chance)

name: Overture Box
notes: Very rarely dropped by Madman (about 4% chance)

name: Barristan's Head
notes: Sometimes dropped by The Collector or found within Secret Rooms

name: Dismas' Head
notes: Sometimes dropped by The Collector or found within Secret Rooms

name: Junia's Head
notes: Sometimes dropped by The Collector or found within Secret Rooms

name: Tempting Goblet
notes:
Very rarely dropped by Bone Courtier.
When originally introduced, Tempting Goblet's rarity was Very Rare.

name: Ancestor's Bottle
notes: Can only be dropped by a Shambler.

name: Ancestor's Candle
notes: Can only be dropped by a Shambler.

name: Ancestor's Map
notes: Can only be dropped by a Shambler.

name: Ancestor's Scroll
notes: Can only be dropped by a Shambler.

name: Ancestor's Tentacle Idol
notes: Can only be dropped by a Shambler.

name: Necromancer's Collar
notes: Quest reward for "Kill the Necromancer Lord."

name: Prophet's Eye
notes: Quest reward for "Kill the Gibbering Prophet."

name: Hag's Ladle
notes: Quest reward for "Kill the Hag Witch."

name: Fuseman's Matchstick
notes: Quest reward for "Destroy the Brigand 16 Pounder."

name: Wilbur's Flag
notes: Quest reward for "Kill the Swine God."

name: Flesh's Heart
notes: Quest reward for "Kill the Formless Flesh."

name: Siren's Conch
notes: Quest reward for "Kill the Beguiling Siren."

name: Crew's Bell
notes: Quest reward for "Kill the Drowned Crew."

name: Vvulf's Tassle
notes:
Quest reward for "Wolves at the Door."
The CRIT buff applies for any enemy that is size 2 and above.

name: Baron's Lash
effectsLi: +75% Debuff Resist if has Crimson Curse
-10% Stun Resist if has Crimson Curse
notes: Quest Reward for "Morbid Entertainment"

name: Viscount's Spices
effectsLi: +100% Healing when Eating if has Crimson Curse
+100% Food Consumed if has Crimson Curse
notes: Quest Reward for "Served Cold"

name: Countess' Fan
effectsLi: +50% Healing Received if has Crimson Curse
-25% Bleed Resist if has Crimson Curse
notes: Quest Reward for "A Bewitching Predator"

name: Callous Talon
effectsLi: +33% Bleed Skill Chance if Torch below 50
notes: Possible quest reward for Shrieker's Prize.

name: Distended Crowseye
notes: Possible quest reward for Shrieker's Prize.

name: Molted Tailfeather
notes: Possible quest reward for Shrieker's Prize.

name: Molted Wingfeather
notes: Possible quest reward for Shrieker's Prize.

name: Ancestor's Vintage
notes: Does not affect the duration of Bloodlust.

name: Coven Signet
notes: The player can have two of this trinket in their inventory.

name: Dazzling Mirror
notes: The +4 SPD applies if any enemy is a Bloodsucker.

name: Mantra of Fasting
effectsLi: +40% MAX HP if Crimson Curse - Wasting
notes: The wasting stage of the curse reduces MAX HP by -20% and SPD by -4, thus this trinket gives a net of +20% MAX HP and +3 SPD.

name: Rat Carcass
effectsLi: Immune to death by Crimson Curse
notes: The player can have two of this trinket in their inventory.

name: Sculptor's Tools
notes: The only enemies that have the Stonework typing are the Garden Guardian boss and Gargoyles.

name: Obsidian Dagger
notes: The Obsidian Dagger is found after defeating the sixth nightmare, and the Severed Hand found after defeating the seventh (final) nightmare.

name: Severed Hand
notes: The Obsidian Dagger is found after defeating the sixth nightmare, and the Severed Hand found after defeating the seventh (final) nightmare.

name: Lens of the Comet
effectsLi: +5% CRIT if Shard Dust in inventory

name: Smoking Skull
effectsLi: +35 DODGE if Shard Dust in inventory

name: Ashen Distillation
effectsLi: +20% Healing Received if Medicinal Herbs in inventory

name: Dirge For The Devoured
effectsLi: +25% DMG if Laudanum in inventory

name: Heretical Passage
effectsLi: +20% Healing Skills if Holy Water in inventory

name: Huskfang Whistle
effectsLi: +50% Bleed Skill Chance if Dog Treats in inventory

name: Mirror Shield
notes:
When attacked, will deal damage to the attacking enemy equal to 30% of the damage taken by the trinket holder. Reflected damage only occurs after the attack. 
This damage does not count as an attack from the equipped hero and is not affected by hero buffs nor enemy PROT. 
Kills from this damage do not count for kill effects such as from the Miller's Pipe or Coat of Many Colors.

name: Topshelf Tonic
effectsLi: +15 DODGE if Medicinal Herbs in inventory

name: Petrified Amulet
effectsLi: +10 ACC if Bandage in inventory

name: Thirsting Blade
effectsLi: On Attack Miss: Self: Lose 5 HP

name: Coat Of Many Colors
effectsLi: On Monster Kill: Buff Self: -2% Stress (2 Battles)
On Monster Kill: Buff Self: +2 ACC (2 Battles)
Hero Killed: Party: Stun (120% base)
notes: This trinket's name is a reference to the biblical coat of many colors worn by Joseph.

name: Miller's Pipe
effectsLi: On Monster Kill: All Monsters: Blight (120% base) 2 pts/rd for 3 rds
Hero Killed: Party: Debuff Target: -20% PROT (100% base) (Quest)
Hero Killed: Party: Debuff Target: -2 SPD (100% base) (Quest)
notes: Enemies killed by damage-over-time effects applied by the equipped hero will trigger On Monster Kill effects. This also applies to the Blight the Pipe itself inflicts after an enemy is killed.

name: Non-Euclidean Hilt
effectsLi: +25% Stun Skill Chance if Holy Water in inventory
On Attack Hit: Blight (120% base) 2 pts/rd for 2 rds

name: Mildred's Locket
effectsLi: Miller: The Reaping: -100% DMG Taken
notes: This trinket can only be acquired by finding Mildred within the Farmstead. Having this equipped when fighting the Miller will cause him to use Immortal Beloved.

name: Thing's Mesmerizing Eye
notes: This trinket is sometimes dropped after killing the Thing from the Stars

name: Crystalline Fang
effectsLi: +10% Stun Skill Chance if HP above 40%
+40% Stun Skill Chance if HP below 41%
notes: This trinket is sometimes dropped after killing the Thing from the Stars

name: Phase Shifting Hide
notes: This trinket is sometimes dropped after killing the Thing from the Stars

name: Prismatic Heart Crystal
notes: This trinket is sometimes dropped after killing the Thing from the Stars

name: Crushed Hemlock
effectsLi: On Melee Attack Hit: Blight (100% Base) 2 pts/rd for 2 rds

name: Sanity's Bane
effectsLi: +25% Death Blow Dealt Chance vs Afflicted

effectsLi: On Melee Attack Hit: Bleed (120% Base) 1 pts/rd for 2 rds

effectsLi: On Melee Attack Hit: Inflict Stress +5

effectsLi: On Melee Attack Hit: Horror +6 Stress/rd for 2 rds (100% Base)

name: Infamous Visage
effectsLi: On Melee Attack Hit: Inflict Stress +15

effectsLi: On Melee Attack: Self: Bleed (50% Base) 2 pts/rd for 3 rds

On Melee Attack Hit: Self Buff: +6% Crit Ranged Skills
On Ranged Attack Hit: Self Buff: +15 ACC Melee Skills
On Ranged Attack Hit: Self Buff: +20% Death Blow Dealt Chance Melee Skills

name: Cloak and Dagger
effectsLi: +10% Death Blow Dealt Chance Melee Skills

name: Sharpening Stone
effectsLi: On Melee Attack Hit: Bleed (120% Base) 1 pts/rd for 3 rds

name: Insignia of Rank
effectsLi: On Attack Crit: Party Buff: +8 ACC (100% Base)

name: Veteran Gauntlet
effectsLi: On Melee Attack Hit: Daze (50% base) for 1 rds

name: Shield Spike
effectsLi: On Riposte Hit: Bleed (100% Base) 1 pts/rd for 4 rds

name: Bleeding Skull
effectsLi: On Heal Debuff Target: -10% Death Blow Resist

name: Sacrificial Kris
effectsLi: +10% Death Blow Dealt Chance vs Marked
On Melee Attack Hit: Mark Target

name: Stone of Patience
notes: Exclusive to the Playstation 4 and VITA versions.

name: Stone of Endurance
notes: Exclusive to the Playstation 4 and VITA versions.

name: Talisman of the Flame
notes:
Quest reward for the first Darkest Dungeon quest, "We Are The Flame."
Despite claiming to be -100% Stress, the trinket will only reduce the stress received by 80%, since that is the cap of stress-reducing buffs.
